contexts.context: ...The military had to shoot and several people were <mark>wounded</mark>. Only then the crowd dispelled. But new...
...were arrested by the Japanese. Several dead and <mark>wounded</mark> on both sides.
...the harbour. Two officers and 54 soldiers are <mark>wounded</mark>, 10 soldiers have been killed. The Russian...
...is weeping remembering that the hundreds of dead and <mark>wounded</mark> on his ships are all Russian. He also...
...lot of soldiers were killed, even more were <mark>wounded</mark>.
